content:
The section about Composite Search Parameters refers to a search parameter called "state-on-date".
Unfortunately, I cannot find on which resources this parameters is defined. It appears that it is not defined in the current search-parameters.json either. Is this parameter not defined anymore?

I'm not sure there ever was such a search parameter. I think it was only an example. However, agree it's confusing and would be better to use something that really exists. Can you submit a change request?
